Articles.Content:
Why can't I upgrade my Vehicle Assembly Base (VAB) more than level 3. I cannot build bigger craft than 18.0t.

![?id=458529917](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=458529917)

Thanks Rob

Welcome aboard!

Upgrade the launchpad to increase the mass limit, the VAB only affects part count.

You need to upgrade the launch pad for more weight. The VAB upgrades only upgrade the size and part count.

I noticed that ninja edit Red Iron Crown....

Blimey! I feel like a fool. That works brilliantly. Thanks to the helpers. 

Rob
